public class Round
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class contains and manages the information for each round

Method Detail

drawFromDiscard

public boolean drawFromDiscard(Player player)
Removes the next card from the discard pile and moves it into the player's hand

Parameters:
player - the player to move the card to
Returns:
false if it is an invalid move (attempt to pick up a skip card)

drawFromDeck

public void drawFromDeck(Player player)
Removes the next card from the deck and moves it to the player's hand

Parameters:
player - the player to move the card to

discard

public void discard(Player player,
                    Card card)
Removes the card from the player's hand and adds it to the discard pile. Then, advances to the next player's turn (& checks if the round is over)

Parameters:
player - the player to remove the card from
card - the card to discard

getTopOfDiscardPile

public Card getTopOfDiscardPile()
Gets the "showing" card on the discard pile

Returns:
the top card from the discard pile
